---
name: ship
description: Stage all changes, commit, and push to remote. Use when shipping all work, pushing all changes, or committing everything in the working tree.
---

# Ship All Changes

## Workflow

1. Stage all unstaged and untracked files with `git add -A`
2. Commit using conventional commit format (feat, fix, chore, docs, refactor, test)
3. Write a concise commit message based on the diff
4. Push to the current branch's upstream
